an4.6:4.1: “Mendicants, these four people are found in the world.
an4.6:4.2: What four? A person may have:
an4.6:4.3: ~Little learning and not get the point of learning. ~Little learning but get the point of learning. ~Much learning but not get the point of learning. ~Much learning and get the point of learning.
an4.6:4.4: And how has a person learned little and not get the point of learning?
an4.6:4.5: It’s when a person has learned little of the
an4.6:4.6: statements, songs, discussions, verses, inspired sayings, legends, stories of past lives, amazing stories, and analyses.
an4.6:4.7: And with the little they’ve learned, they understand neither the meaning nor the text, nor do they practice in line with the teaching.
an4.6:4.8: That’s how a person has learned little and doesn’t get the point of learning.
an4.6:5.1: And how has a person learned little but get the point of learning?
an4.6:5.2: It’s when a person has learned little of the
an4.6:5.3: statements, songs, discussions, verses, inspired sayings, legends, stories of past lives, amazing stories, and analyses.
an4.6:5.4: But with the little they’ve learned, they understand the meaning and the text, and they practice in line with the teaching.
an4.6:5.5: That’s how a person has learned little but gets the point of learning.
an4.6:6.1: And how has a person learned much but not get the point of learning?
an4.6:6.2: It’s when a person has learned much of the
an4.6:6.3: statements, songs, discussions, verses, inspired sayings, legends, stories of past lives, amazing stories, and analyses.
an4.6:6.4: But even though they’ve learned much, they understand neither the meaning nor the text, nor do they practice in line with the teaching.
an4.6:6.5: That’s how a person has learned much but doesn’t get the point of learning.
an4.6:7.1: And how has a person learned much and get the point of learning?
an4.6:7.2: It’s when a person has learned much of the
an4.6:7.3: statements, songs, discussions, verses, inspired sayings, legends, stories of past lives, amazing stories, and analyses.
an4.6:7.4: And with the large amount they’ve learned, they understand the meaning and the text, and they practice in line with the teaching.
an4.6:7.5: That’s how a person has learned much and gets the point of learning.
an4.6:7.6: These are the four people found in the world.”
an4.6:8.3: they’ll criticize you on both counts,
an4.6:8.4: for your ethics and your learning.
an4.6:9.2: and you are steady in ethics,
an4.6:11.2: and you are steady in ethics,
an4.6:11.3: they’ll praise you on both counts,
an4.6:11.4: for your ethics and your learning.
an4.6:12.1: A wise disciple of the Buddha
an4.6:12.2: who has much learning, and has memorized the teachings,
an4.6:12.3: is like a coin of mountain gold.
an4.6:12.4: Who is worthy of criticizing them?
an4.6:12.6: and by Brahmā, too, they’re praised.”
